content: floriculture cowl karlie paige this cowl is inspired by all of the beautiful plants in my mother s flower farm i hope you enjoy knitting this as much as i did information size gauge 7 5 /19cm tall 26 sts = 4 /10 cm in 10 5 /27cm wide stockinette colourwork pattern knit in the round and blocked yarn 230 fingering/sport weight abbreviations yarn 120 yards mc 110 yards cc co cast on cc contrast colour sample is knit in queensland the cc will make up collection tenderfoot %75 the flowers in the merino %25 polyamide cowl 104 old ivory mc mc main colour 108 bordeaux red cc bor beginning of round *tip if you want a cowl that has a stiff fabric with structure i suggest using a non-superwash wool materials us 2 5 3mm needles or appropriate needle size to achieve gauge stitch marker tapestry needle 01 floriculture cowl - karlie paige instructions co 140 stitches with your cc the colour that will be used for the flowers join in the round and place a bor marker bottom border knit 3 rounds with your cc yarn break yarn join mc yarn knit one round purl 2 rounds with your mc yarn knit 1 round with your mc yarn colourwork section join your cc yarn and begin the colourwork chart below knit the chart for a total of 3 times top border break cc yarn knit 1 round in your mc purl 2 rounds with your mc yarn knit 1 round with you mc yarn break mc join cc knit 3 rounds bind off weave in ends block and enjoy 02 floriculture cowl - karlie paige colourwork chart 03 floriculture cowl - karlie paige share your project use the hashtag #floriculturecowl and tag @_karlie_paige_ on instagram if you want to share your project 04 floriculture cowl - karlie paige
